vote.title: Authorize (1) a six-month service contract to complete a sand bunker renovation project at Stevens Park Golf Course for the Park & Recreation Department with Landscapes Unlimited, LLC in the amount of $499,538.06 through The Interlocal Purchasing System cooperative agreement; and (2) an increase in appropriations not to exceed $499,538.06 in the Golf Improvement Fund - Not to exceed $499,538.06 - Financing: Golf Improvement Fund
vote.description: Authorize (1) a six-month service contract to complete a sand bunker renovation project at Stevens Park Golf Course for the Park & Recreation Department with Landscapes Unlimited, LLC in the amount of $499,538.06 through The Interlocal Purchasing System cooperative agreement; and (2) an increase in appropriations not to exceed $499,538.06 in the Golf Improvement Fund - Not to exceed $499,538.06 - Financing: Golf Improvement Fund
